name: Surfing Adventure 1
description: Experience the thrill of riding the waves on the beautiful beaches of Nice.

description: Embark on a scenic hike through the breathtaking mountains surrounding the area.

description: Immerse yourself in the rich cultural heritage of the city with our guided tour.

description: Set sail on a memorable sea adventure, exploring hidden coves and crystal-clear waters.

name: Food Tasting 5
description: Indulge your taste buds with a gastronomic journey, sampling local delicacies and flavors.
